description: Rey Gold is one of those guys that always gets our inbox flooded with requests to see him more often, doing more things. Unfortunately, we're only graced with his presence a couple times a year...at most.He hasn't done a scene on NextDoorMale for a very long time, so we're pleased, as we're sure you are too, to have him back for some x-rated fun. He's 22 year old now and ready to show off again.For this boner-inducing scene, Rey will be touching himself in the hot tube, on a chair, and finishing himself off on the bed, all while reading a smutty magazine. That's what guys do when they have a bit of spare time, didn't you know?We sincerely hope you enjoy this rare occasion. You know Rey Gold did!
title: Rey Gold
